resources.string: My name is Kushagr Saxena.I am an app developer with android development as my domain, specialising in User Interfaces. I am pursing my B.Tech in Computer Science in Ghaziabad and have a year of experience in app development.
I have done my schooling from Assisi Convent School, Baheri affiliated to ICSE board.
I am pursuing B.Tech from Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College, Ghaziabad affiliated to AKTU.
